newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austrian shares close up, led by AMS.
newsitem.headline: Austrian shares close up, led by AMS.

text.p: 1320 GMT - Austrian shares close higher on Monday in a steady market, with shares in semiconductor maker Austria Mikro Systeme (AMS) leading the way, boosted by advances in U.S. electronics shares, traders say.
* ATX index up 3.17 points or 0.29 percent at 1,100.85
* December ATX future up 6.7 points at 1,105.0
* 13 ATX shares up, seven down, one unchanged
* Leading gainer AMS up 5.14 percent at 757 schillings
* Leading decliner Wolford, down 3.34 percent at 335.9 schillings
* Vienna Bourse index up 1.01 points or 0.24 percent at 418.84 -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12257
